About a year ago, I wrote my first ever blog post ~ about blogging ~ and tbh, I was really hoping to have published a few more posts by now...but here we are, talking again about why blogging is a valuable way to spend your time and feeling a little sad that I haven't done more by now.

I. Adding a blog to your personal Quarto website

Our Master of Environmental Data Science (MEDS) students created the bones of their Quarto websites a few months ago, and more recently took a little dive into website customization using Sass & CSS. For anyone who's looking to get started on their website-building journey, feel free to explore the following resources:
